content.query:
IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM sys.external_tables WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID('dbo.F_SSTConsignment') )
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.F_SSTConsignment
GO


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.F_SSTConsignment (
	[lms_consignment_id] int,
	[lms_consignment_cref] nvarchar(4000),
	[lms_consignment_cdate] datetime2(7),
	[lms_consignment_userid] int,
	[lms_consignment_appointment] datetime2(7),
	[lms_consignment_deliverby] datetime2(7),

	[lms_consignment_lastupdate] datetime2(7),

	[lms_parcelbyconsignment_aggvolumiserweight] numeric(28,2),
	[lms_parcelbyconsignment_noparcels] bigint,
	[lms_bill_consignmentr_id] int,
	[lms_bill_consignmentr_consignid] int,
	[lms_bill_consignmentr_updatedate] datetime2(7),
	[lms_bill_consignmentr_pickuprouteid] int,
	[lms_bill_consignmentr_deliverrouteid] int,
	[lms_bill_consignmentr_chargeweight] numeric(28,2),

	[lms_bill_consignmentr_invalidpcode] int,
	[lms_bill_consignmentr_programno] int,
	[lms_bill_consignmentr_totrate] numeric(28,2),
	[lms_bill_consignmentr_routecharge] numeric(28,2),
	[lms_bill_consignmentr_minweight] numeric(28,2),
	[lms_bill_consignmentr_minrate] numeric(28,2),
	[lms_bill_consignmentr_corderno] nvarchar(4000),
	[lms_bill_consignmentr_custref] nvarchar(4000),
	[lms_bill_consignmentr_manualupdateflag] int,

	[lms_bill_consignmentr_vweight] numeric(28,2),
	[lms_bill_consignmentr_custref3] nvarchar(4000),
	[lms_bill_consignmentr_units] int,
	[lms_bill_consignmentr_totsurcharges] numeric(28,2),

	[lms_bill_billtypesr_id] int,
	[lms_bill_billtypesr_description] nvarchar(4000),
	[lms_bill_billtypesr_surchargeflag] int,
	[lms_bill_zoneroute_pickupid] int,
	[lms_bill_zoneroute_pickupdescription] nvarchar(4000),
	[lms_bill_zoneroute_pickupzoneid] int,
	[lms_bill_zoneroute_pickupzrscode] nvarchar(4000),

	[lms_bill_zoneroute_deliverid] int,
	[lms_bill_zoneroute_deliverdescription] nvarchar(4000),
	[lms_bill_zoneroute_deliverzoneid] int,
	[lms_bill_zoneroute_deliverzrscode] nvarchar(4000),
	[lms_bill_zoneroute_deliverzonerouteorder] int,
	[lms_bill_zoneroute_deliverzonetype] nvarchar(4000),
	[lms_bill_zoneroute_deliverbroutemasterid] int,
	[lms_bill_zoneroute_deliverbroutecode] nvarchar(4000),
	[lms_bill_servicetype_id] int,
	[lms_bill_servicetype_description] nvarchar(4000),
	[lms_bill_servicetype_code] nvarchar(4000),
	[lms_bill_servicetype_ccode] nvarchar(4000),
	[lms_bill_zone_pickupid] int,
	[lms_bill_zone_pickupdescription] nvarchar(4000),
	[lms_bill_zone_pickupzonemasterid] int,
	[lms_bill_zone_pickupcountryid] int,

	[lms_bill_zone_deliverzonemasterid] int,

	[lms_bill_delivertype_description] nvarchar(4000),
	[lms_broutemaster_pickupid] int,

	[lms_broutemaster_deliverdescription] nvarchar(4000),

	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Semi Structured Data/OPS/sstconsignment.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [synapse_citylogisticsstorage_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.F_SSTConsignment
GO
